page.title: 20Cold Norton - Domesday 1985.
page.content: This Domesday Survey has been carried out by teachers and pupils from Cold Norton Primary School durint the summer term of 1985. It has been an interesting term's work but has kept us , and particularly the two teachers who have been involved, (Mr Cuff and Mr Emery) very busy and has only been completed right at the end of term which finished on July 19th. The survey has been made more difficult by the very disappointing weather of this summer which has made it almost imposible tp get out of the school for much of the term. However, eventually, all the children in the third and fourth years (aged 9 to 11) have helped in some way and this has been the finished project. We hope one day that we shall be able to afford one of the players so we shall be able to see the finished survey.
